name: reset/you
description:
Xephyr is a high-tech combat cyborg. Cirrus is her superior officer. And also her girlfriend. So when Cirrus suddenly falls ill with a virus that only affects cyborgs, Xephyr is determined to do whatever it takes to find a cure for her. Even if it costs her her life.

This game was made for Nanoreno 2018 and is roughly 4000 words. There are (technically) two endings. Script, code, sprites and music are by supercircuit, backgrounds are by Uncle Mugen.
